about.heroText: We are committed to making Kazakh language learning accessible, engaging, and effective for learners at all levels.
about.infoText: With a shared passion for languages and learning, our team has put together an approach to Kazakh that combines interactive lessons with everyday practice.
about.teamDescription: Our team is a group of creative and dedicated individuals with technical skills, striving to find simple and effective solutions for language learning.

faq1.question: How does the leveling system work?
faq1.answer: On our platform, your initial knowledge level is determined through a test, after which you are assigned a beginner, intermediate, or advanced level. You can increase your level by completing lessons and taking assessments.

faq2.question: How much time should I spend learning daily?
faq2.answer: We recommend 15-30 minutes of daily practice for optimal results. Consistency is more important than duration.

faq3.question: Do you offer personalized feedback?
faq3.answer: Yes, our AI-based system offers helpful feedback on your pronunciation and basic language usage to help you improve quickly.

faq4.question: What happens if I don’t pass an assessment?
faq4.answer: If you don’t pass an assessment, don’t worry! You can review the materials again, practice more, and retake the assessment until you feel confident.

faq5.question: Is the platform suitable for self-study?
faq5.answer: Yes, it’s designed for independent learners and provides helpful support throughout the learning process.

faq6.question: What kinds of lessons are included?
faq6.answer: You’ll find reading materials, videos for listening practice, pronunciation support, and interactive quizzes to reinforce your learning.

home.headline: Start learning Kazakh language with us!
home.whyDescription: We believe that language is more than just words — it's a bridge to culture, identity, and connection. Whether you're learning Kazakh to explore your heritage, travel, or open new doors, we’re here to support you every step of the way.
home.coursesDescription: Discover trending Kazakh lessons to boost your skills and reach the next level.
home.proficiencyCardText: Take the proficiency test and find out your level of Kazakh language learning
home.watchReadCardText: Watch movies and read books in Kazakh with us
home.chatbotCardText: Correct your pronunciation with our AI-chatbot and speak like a natives
home.subscribeHeading: Curious to learn Kazakh? Log in to get the latest updates and start learning

learnPage.readDescription: We are committed to providing engaging reading materials to help you learn Kazakh through authentic texts, stories, and articles.
learnPage.videoDescription: Learn through our curated video content with interactive subtitles and cultural insights to improve your listening comprehension.
learnPage.chatbotDescription: Practice your conversational skills with our AI-powered chatbot that provides instant feedback and personalized language practice.
learnPage.pronunciationDescription: Perfect your pronunciation with our interactive exercises to sound more like a native speaker.

readPage.headline: Read together

chatbot.welcome: Send a 'Hi' message to start your chat journey with our AI assistant
chatbot.howToUse: This AI chatbot is designed to help you practice your Kazakh language skills. You can ask it questions about Kazakh grammar, request translations, or even have basic conversations in Kazakh. The chatbot will respond with helpful information and correct your language use when necessary. Try asking questions like "How do you say hello in Kazakh?" or "Can you explain Kazakh verb conjugation?"
chatbot.whatCanItDo: What can the AI chatbot do?
chatbot.capabilities: The AI chatbot can: 1) Translate common phrases between English and Kazakh, 2) Answer questions about Kazakh grammar, vocabulary, and culture, 3) Help you practice basic conversations, 4) Provide pronunciation tips for difficult Kazakh sounds, and 5) Suggest learning resources tailored to your needs. While it's not a replacement for a human teacher, it's a valuable tool for supplementing your learning.

pronunciation.howToText: Click the record button and pronounce the Kazakh word shown on the screen. Our speech recognition technology will analyze your pronunciation and give you feedback on how to improve. Practice regularly to master Kazakh phonetics and sound more like a native speaker.
pronunciation.tipsText: Speak clearly at a normal pace, not too fast or too slow. Position yourself in a quiet environment with minimal background noise. Hold your device approximately 20 cm from your mouth. Practice the most challenging sounds in Kazakh like қ, ғ, and ң separately before incorporating them into words.
pronunciation.browserNotSupported: Audio recording is not supported in this browser.
pronunciation.microphoneError: Error accessing microphone. Please check your permissions.
pronunciation.errorProcessingAudio: Error processing your pronunciation. Please try again.
pronunciation.genericError: An error occurred. Please try again.
pronunciation.correct: Excellent pronunciation! You sound like a native speaker.
pronunciation.incorrect: Your pronunciation needs some work. Try again!
pronunciation.subtitle: Pronounce this word
pronunciation.title: Pronunciation Practice
pronunciation.perfect: Perfect! Your pronunciation matches exactly what was expected.
pronunciation.excellent: Excellent! Your pronunciation is very close to native.
pronunciation.good: Good job! Your pronunciation is recognizable but could use some refinement.
pronunciation.fair: Almost there! Try to focus on the correct sounds. We heard '{{heard}}' instead of '{{expected}}'.
pronunciation.unrecognized: We couldn't recognize your pronunciation of '{{expected}}'. Try speaking more clearly.
